snippet: Iman Shumpert, Jason Kidd and Kenyon Martin, key supporting role players, combined to miss all 11 of their field goal attempts and did not take a free throw.
abstract: New York Knicks key supporting role players Iman Shumpert, Jason Kidd, and Kenyon Martin score total of zero points in 61 combined minutes of Game 4 playoff loss to Indiana Pacers.
lead_paragraph: Iman Shumpert, Jason Kidd and Kenyon Martin, key supporting role players, combined to miss all 11 of their field goal attempts and did not take a free throw.

headline.seo: Knicks’ Shumpert, Kidd, Martin: 61 Minutes and 0 Points
headline.main: Shumpert, Kidd, Martin: 61 Minutes and 0 Points
headline.print_headline: Shumpert, Kidd, Martin: 61 Minutes and 0 Points
